pr_title: JENA-1913: Multiple --file on the Fuseki command line

timeline.bodyText: .get(0)? (Spent the day looking at JS and Python, and on mobile, so I might be confusing langs... if so ignore please)
timeline.author: kinow

replies.bodyText:
Arrg! .get(0) both times (quick fix applied).
The messages need refining as well. Logging works different in the two different server startup sequences ("legacy" - sigh).
replies.author: afs

timeline.bodyText: Isn't the parameter the index of the element? Or is it the number of elements to pop/shift?
timeline.author: kinow
